text: Maccabi Ground, Petah Tikva () was a football stadium in Petah Tikva, on Stampfer street. The ground was in use between 1926Avshalom Gisin, Willy Berger and Gaul Machlis Gave the Luzons a Tradition Asher Goldberg, 27 April 2003, HaAretz and 1975 and was abandoned when the lot was given to the Petah Tikva municipality and was built over.Maccabi P.T., Avi Luzon and the Land Bonanza Tal Wolk, 27 February 2014, Globes ==See also== *List of football stadiums in Israel ==References== Category:Defunct football venues in Israel Category:Maccabi Petah Tikva F.C. Category:Sports venues in Petah Tikva
title: Maccabi Ground, Petah Tikva
